fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 424.77 lakh crore compared with Rs 146.51 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 131.85 points or 0.77% to settle at 16,945.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, surged 5.17% to 15.24. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and Infosys were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
